ai-mil7.4.7:1.1_0: “Venerable sir, what are the five factors should be cared by one who belongs to?”
ai-mil7.4.7:1.2_0: “Just as the moon in the bright fortnight, so the moon swallows,
ai-mil7.4.7:1.3_0: In the same way, a meditator who is engaged in good conduct, devoted to the meditation on embracing the meditation of mindfulness and situational awareness, guarding the sense doors, eats in moderation, and dedicated to wakefulness. He should guard the sense doors, eat in moderation, and is dedicated to wakefulness.
ai-mil7.4.7:1.4_0: This is the first kind of moon.
ai-mil7.4.7:2.1_0: Furthermore, great king, the moon glory
ai-mil7.4.7:2.2_0: In the same way, a meditator who is engaged in sex with lofty attainments.
ai-mil7.4.7:2.3_0: This is the second way to get hold of the moon.
ai-mil7.4.7:3.1_0: Furthermore, the moon glows the cloudless,
ai-mil7.4.7:3.2_0: In the same way, a meditator should consequence the meditator’s conduct by way of body.
ai-mil7.4.7:3.3_0: This is the third kind of moon.
ai-mil7.4.7:4.1_0: Furthermore, great king, the moon glows here in the sky,
ai-mil7.4.7:4.2_0: In the same way, a meditator should be engaged in virtue to live in good conduct.
ai-mil7.4.7:4.3_0: This is the fourth way to get hold of the moon.
ai-mil7.4.7:5.1_0: Furthermore, great king, the moon glows in the sky,
ai-mil7.4.7:5.2_0: In the same way, although you can approach families for families with a thought of sight, let us go to visit families.
ai-mil7.4.7:5.4_0: When the Buddha has spoken this, the gods of the Thirty-Three are constantly attached to their body, speech, and mind is immersed in samādhi like this.”
ai-mil7.4.7:6.1_0: The seventh enquiry is the seventh (called) Moon,
